0.9.9.name: wordpress/mobile-app-showcase
0.9.9.description:
This WordPress plugin simply adds a sidebar widget to showcase your mobile application. Whether an iPhone, an Android or a Windows app, this widget will display the appstore image and proper link.

In addition to the sidebar widget, the showcase badge may also be displayed on your posts or pages using a shortcode.

NOTE If you are upgrading from a previous version, you may need to go into the widget configuration, confirm settings and SAVE those settings! In some odd cases, the wrong application image is showing incorrectly.
